Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Wah[ib]ra[-..] with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised hoe and an adze, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar, the lower leg section is missing.
Condition: incomplete - foot and lower leg section missing
